answers.answer: I'm pretty much a home body, so my life really hasn't changed much.But I'll say we would be going out for Thai food

Going to a male strip bar lol, just playin!  I'd probably be doing the strip tease for my man and feeling sexy. Ooh and don't forget the drinks!  Right now I do NOT feel sexy at all with this big ol belly!
I'd still be at home with my husband and kids. Cooking us dinner and waiting on bedtime. lol
I'd be having lots of sex.Use to he everyday now it's like once every couple days.
I'd get a sitter and have sushi with my hunny and get a few drinks at our favorite bar after! Oooooo that would be nice!

I just read your previous post about diabetes. I just found out I have it yesterday after failing the 3hr test and have to wait a whole week to meet with the diabetes doctor. I'm nervous about it because I've read the complications it can have for the baby. What happened to your son when he was born if you don't mind me asking?
I'd probably still be at home, cooking dinner. Not much of a 'going out' type. But I were to go out, I'd probably be out for a nice, medium steak
I'd be begging hubby to take me out to the bar and have crazy drunk sex when we got home at 3am... lol!!! I miss those days....
Cleaning my house and not hurting while doing it lol and playing more with my daughter :) and having sex with my husband uhhh I can't wait to do that again its been too long lol

question: Tired of feeling bad so I want to play a new game!If I wasn't pregnant I'd be doing ???? This Friday night-getting a baby sitter... and going to my favorite bar on the lake and watching the sun go down with a Corona in my hand with my hubby and best friend!☆Fill in ur blank!!☆
